title: Superfood Chaga Cheesecake
directions: Process all ingredients until crumbly in a food processor.
This should hold together fine without any water but if needed, add 1/2 teaspoon water and process briefly.
Press into the bottom of a 6″ spring form pan.
Blend the chaga tea, cashews, and maple syrup until completely smooth.
Add the powders, vanilla, salt, and coconut oil.
Transfer 1/3 cup of the mixture to a bowl.
Whisk in the cacao powder (sift it in) and maple syrup.
Pour the superfood mixture over the crust.
Spoon blobs of the chocolate mixture on top and gently push it into the other filling with a spoon.
Use a chopstick to swirl the mixtures together.
Chill in the freezer for 4-6 hours and then transfer to the fridge for 12 hours.
Garnish with cacao nibs along the edge.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon suma root powder or ashwaganda
